title: LaVar Ball Reportedly Suffers Severe Medical Issue Leading to Amputation
text:
LaVar Ball, the outspoken father of NBA stars Lonzo and LaMelo Ball, has reportedly undergone a right foot amputation due to a serious medical issue, according to TMZ Sports .
Despite the significant health setback, Ball is said to be in “great spirits” and recovering well.
A Once Larger-Than-Life Personality Now Out of the Spotlight Ball first rose to national fame in 2017 when he made bold and often outrageous claims while promoting his three sons, Lonzo, LiAngelo, and LaMelo, as the future of basketball. At the time, he dominated sports headlines, making controversial statements about NBA legends, launching his own Big Baller Brand, and even securing a reality show for the Ball family.
His predictions about his sons’ careers weren’t entirely off.
Lonzo Ball was a top-two NBA draft pick and became a key contributor in the league before suffering ongoing knee injuries. LaMelo Ball is now a rising star and an NBA All-Star with the Charlotte Hornets. LiAngelo Ball, though unable to secure a lasting spot in the NBA, has shifted focus to a budding music career. — TMSPN.com (@sportsgossip) February 19, 2025 The Rise and Fall of Big Baller Brand LaVar Ball’s ambitions extended beyond hyping up his sons—he also launched Big Baller Brand (BBB), a clothing and sneaker company. However, BBB fizzled out after financial struggles and quality concerns.
As his sons established themselves in their careers, LaVar gradually stepped out of the media spotlight, which may explain why his recent health issues were not widely known until now.
LaVar Ball got his foot amputated ? pic.twitter.com/3H7Kvnb9s1
— LakeShowYo (@LakeShowYo) February 19, 2025 A Quiet Battle, But Still in Good Spirits While details surrounding Ball’s medical condition remain unclear, his positive attitude despite undergoing amputation suggests that he is approaching this challenge with the same bravado he once brought to sports media.
Given his history of resilience, it wouldn’t be surprising if LaVar Ball makes a comeback in some capacity—whether in sports, business, or entertainment. For now, however, he appears to be focused on his recovery and family.
